tr_quotes.quote: Açık olun böylelikle hayat daha kolaylaşacaktır. Bir bardak sudaki bir kaşık tuz, suyu içilmez hale getirir. Bir göldeki bir kaşık tuz ise neredeyse fark edilmez.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Hareketler ve sözler uyumlu olursa tüm dünya değişir.
tr_quotes.author: Chuang Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Küçük şeylerden zevk alın, bir gün geriye baktığınızda onların aslında büyük şeyler olduğunu fark edebilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Brault

tr_quotes.quote: Hepimiz imkansız durumlar olarak zekice kılık değiştiren muhteşem fırsatlar dizisiyle karşılaşırız.
tr_quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

tr_quotes.quote: Bizi sınırlayan yeteneklerimiz değil vizyonumuzdur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Düşünceleriniz inanılmaz derecede güçlüdür. Onları akıllıca seçin.
tr_quotes.author: Joe Dispenza

tr_quotes.quote: Zorluklardan mucizeler büyür.
tr_quotes.author: Jean de La Bruyère

tr_quotes.quote: Seni öldürmeyen şey, seni güçlendirir.
tr_quotes.author: Nietzche

tr_quotes.quote: Beynin gücü, düşüncesinin zayıflığı kadardır.
tr_quotes.author: Eleanor Doan

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kadar çok çalışırsam o kadar şanslı oluyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Gary Player

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısızlık bir çıkmaz sokak değil, bir dönemeçtir.
tr_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

tr_quotes.quote: Olumlu bir şey, olumsuz olan her şeyden daha iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısızlık, başarıya lezzetini katan çeşnidir.
tr_quotes.author: Truman Capote

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer şans sizin yanınızda değilse var gücünüzle çabalayın.
tr_quotes.author: Arnold Palmer

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer umutsuz olsaydı kelebek, bir günlük ömrünü uçarak geçirir miydi?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Pozitif düşünce ile birleşen pozitif eyleminiz başarıyla sonuçlanır.
tr_quotes.author: Shiv Khera

tr_quotes.quote: Zorluklar zihni güçlendirir; çalışmanın bedeni güçlendirdiği gibi.
tr_quotes.author: Seneca

tr_quotes.quote: Pozitif düşünceler seni yükseltir. Negatif düşünceler ise seni hep aşağıya çeker.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her gün güzel geçmeyebilir ama her günün içinde bir güzellik mutlaka vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta pişmanlık diye bir şey yok yalnızca çıkarılan dersler var.
tr_quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

tr_quotes.quote: Rahat ol sevgili ruh! Bulutların arkasında daima ışık vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

tr_quotes.quote: Olumlu ve olumsuz sadece aynı paranın farklı taraflara bakan yüzüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Al Schneider

tr_quotes.quote: En karanlık anlarımızda, ışığı görmek için odaklanmamız gerekiyor.
tr_quotes.author: Aristoteles

tr_quotes.quote: Kaderinin hakimi ve ruhunun kaptanı sensin! İstediğin yaşamı kurabilirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

tr_quotes.quote: Yüzünüzü güneşe döndüğünüz zaman, gölgeler hep arkanızda kalır.
tr_quotes.author: Helen Keller

tr_quotes.quote: Olumlu bir tutum, sahiden rüyaları gerçeğe dönüştürebilir. Bende işe yaradı.
tr_quotes.author: David Bailey

tr_quotes.quote: Zihninize hakim olan düşüncelerden asla daha büyük olamazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

tr_quotes.quote: Bir savaşı kazanmak için birden fazla kez mücadele vermen gerekebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

tr_quotes.quote: Olumlu düşünme, her şeyi olumsuz düşünceden daha iyi yapmanıza izin verir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Çık evinden neşeyle, karşına ilk çıkana selam ver gülümse, aydınlık bir gün dile.
tr_quotes.author: Can Yücel

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şey için geç değildir. Ne hayatınızı değiştirmek için ne de mutlu olmak için.
tr_quotes.author: Jane Fonda

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı azminizi hiç kaybetmeden başarısızlıktan başarısızlığa koşmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

tr_quotes.quote: Çok uzun zaman önce biri ağaç dikmese bugün bir başkası gölgede oturamazdı.
tr_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamı seviyorsanız zamanınızı boşa harcamayın. Çünkü yaşamın özü zamandır.
tr_quotes.author: Bruce Lee

tr_quotes.quote: Düşündüğünüz, inandığınız ve güvenle beklediğiniz her şey mutlaka gerçekleşir.
tr_quotes.author: Jack Addington

tr_quotes.quote: Hepimiz hayal kurmaya devam ediyoruz ve şanslıysak bu hayaller gerçek oluyor.
tr_quotes.author: Katie Holmes

tr_quotes.quote: Dünya sizi dizlerinizin üzerine ittiğinde, dua etmek için mükemmel bir konumdasınızdır.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat çok ilginç. En büyük acılarınız bir gün en güçlü yanlarınız haline geliyor.
tr_quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar, her başarısızlığın daha iyi şeyler için bir atlama taşı olabileceğini unutmamalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Colonel Sanders

tr_quotes.quote: Bizler yalnızca insanız. Sadece bir kez yaşıyoruz ve hayat muhteşem bir şey.
tr_quotes.author: Emma Stone

tr_quotes.quote: Başarının anahtarı ne bilmiyorum ama başarısızlığın anahtarının herkesi mutlu etmek olduğu kesin.
tr_quotes.author: Bill Cosby

tr_quotes.quote: Kışımız olmasaydı, ilkbahar o kadar keyifli olmazdı. Kimi zaman sıkıntıları yaşamasaydık, refah da o kadar hoş karşılanmamış olacaktı.
tr_quotes.author: Anne Bradstreet

tr_quotes.quote: Her sabah bir seçim şansınız vardır. O gün pozitif mi yoksa negatif düşünen biri mi olacaksınız? Pozitif düşünmek size güç verir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ölümü değil, yaşamı olumlayın. Kendi kendinizle ilgili mutlu, ışıl ışıl, başarılı, sakin ve güçlü olduğunuzu içeren bir görüş edinin.
tr_quotes.author: Joseph Murphy

tr_quotes.quote: Pozitif davranışlar, pozitif sonuçlar üretir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer umutsuz olsaydı kelebek, bir günlük ömrünü uçarak geçirir miydi?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Pozitif düşünceler seni yükseltir. Negatif düşünceler ise seni hep aşağıya çeker.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: All I can control is myself and just keep having a positive attitude
en_quotes.author: Rose Namajunas

en_quotes.quote: I surround myself with good people who make me feel great and give me positive energy
en_quotes.author: Ali Krieger

en_quotes.quote: Don't forget to tell yourself positive things daily! You must love yourself internally to glow externally
en_quotes.author: Hannah Bronfman

en_quotes.quote: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: It's not the situation, but whether we react negative or respond positive to the situation that is important
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Each day, I come in with a positive attitude, trying to get better
en_quotes.author: Stefon Diggs

en_quotes.quote: A strong positive mental attitude will create more miracles than any wonder drug
en_quotes.author: Patricia Neal

en_quotes.quote: Virtually nothing is impossible in this world if you just put your mind to it and maintain a positive attitude
en_quotes.author: Lou Holtz

en_quotes.quote: In every day, there are 1,440 minutes. That means we have 1,440 daily opportunities to make a positive impact
en_quotes.author: Les Brown

en_quotes.quote: Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one
en_quotes.author: Hans Selye

en_quotes.quote: Positive thinking is a valuable tool that can help you overcome obstacles, deal with pain, and reach new goals
en_quotes.author: Amy Morin

en_quotes.quote: Be true to yourself and surround yourself with positive, supportive people
en_quotes.author: Payal Kadakia

en_quotes.quote: A positive atmosphere nurtures a positive attitude, which is required to take positive action
en_quotes.author: Richard M. DeVos

en_quotes.quote: I always feel good after I change my hair. You get a haircut and feel positive and ready to take on the day
en_quotes.author: Kirstin Maldonado

en_quotes.quote: The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do
en_quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

en_quotes.quote: I believe in karma, and I believe if you put out positive vibes to everybody, that's all you're going to get back
en_quotes.author: Kesha

en_quotes.quote: When you are enthusiastic about what you do, you feel this positive energy. It's very simple
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: The learner always begins by finding fault, but the scholar sees the positive merit in everything
en_quotes.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

en_quotes.quote: Negative attitude is nine times more powerful than positive attitude
en_quotes.author: Bikram Choudhury

en_quotes.quote: The worst times can be the best if you think with positive energy
en_quotes.author: Domenico Dolce

en_quotes.quote: Your smile will give you a positive countenance that will make people feel comfortable around you
en_quotes.author: Les Brown

en_quotes.quote: Don't focus on negative things; focus on the positive, and you will flourish
en_quotes.author: Alek Wek

en_quotes.quote: Inspiration comes from within yourself. One has to be positive. When you're positive, good things happen
en_quotes.author: Deep Roy

en_quotes.quote: Education should learn from the positive side of gaming - reward, accomplishment, and fun
en_quotes.author: Sebastian Thrun

en_quotes.quote: I do a good job of staying positive and just moving on
en_quotes.author: Katie Taylor

en_quotes.quote: I love everybody. One of the great things about me is that I have a very positive attitude
en_quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

en_quotes.quote: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain
en_quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

en_quotes.quote: Celebrate yourself... and stay positive!
en_quotes.author: Khoudia Diop

en_quotes.quote: If you're not making mistakes, then you're not doing anything. I'm positive that a doer makes mistakes
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: If you have a positive frame of mind, you can manifest positive things in your life
en_quotes.author: Alesha Dixon

en_quotes.quote: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: I've learned that positive thinking and encouragement are essential for leadership and progress
en_quotes.author: Richard M. DeVos

en_quotes.quote: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me
en_quotes.author: David Bailey

en_quotes.quote: You should also appreciate the goodness around you, and surround yourself with positive people
en_quotes.author: Nadia Comaneci

en_quotes.quote: Helping people boost themselves out of poverty is the best way to make a lasting positive difference in a person's life
en_quotes.author: Naveen Jain

en_quotes.quote: A good laugh is sunshine in the house
en_quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

en_quotes.quote: I think if you just look at life in a positive way, positive things will happen
en_quotes.author: Jake Owen

en_quotes.quote: I'm a positive person who likes to have fun and get the best out of every day
en_quotes.author: Eddie the Eagle

en_quotes.quote: To succeed, you need to find something to hold on to, something to motivate you, something to inspire you
en_quotes.author: Tony Dorsett

en_quotes.quote: Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation
en_quotes.author: Michael Jordan

en_quotes.quote: Things can go away just like that. You got to be always respectful and nice and positive
en_quotes.author: Rich Brian

en_quotes.quote: Natural ability is important, but you can go far without it if you have the focus, drive, desire and positive attitude
en_quotes.author: Kirsten Sweetland

en_quotes.quote: You will always have ups and downs in your life and your career, but just stay positive and go for it
en_quotes.author: Angelique Kerber

en_quotes.quote: The ability to remain calm and focused in stressful situations is central to making positive decisions
en_quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

en_quotes.quote: A people without a positive history is like a vehicle without an engine
en_quotes.author: Steven Biko

en_quotes.quote: I've always been controversial because I offer new ideas. For me to be controversial, I think this is positive
en_quotes.author: Avigdor Lieberman

en_quotes.quote: I had to develop the mentality and stay positive about making my comeback
en_quotes.author: Alonzo Mourning

en_quotes.quote: You win some and lose some. It's all part of the game. You have to take it in a very positive way
en_quotes.author: P. V. Sindhu

en_quotes.quote: Don't let people disrespect you. My mom says don't open the door to the devil. Surround yourself with positive people
en_quotes.author: Cuba Gooding, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Our chief want is someone who will inspire us to be what we know we could be
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: My style motto is pretty classic: you give off a positive energy when you wear what you're most comfortable in
en_quotes.author: Petra Collins

en_quotes.quote: I don't want to be linked to anything negative. I don't want negative energy. I want everything positive around me
en_quotes.author: Kendra Wilkinson

en_quotes.quote: Every positive value has its price in negative terms... the genius of Einstein leads to Hiroshima
en_quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

en_quotes.quote: I often think that the night is more alive and more richly colored than the day
en_quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: College was especially sweet because of the positive, hopeful atmosphere of a college campus
en_quotes.author: Jerry Kramer

en_quotes.quote: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Confidence isn't optimism or pessimism, and it's not a character attribute. It's the expectation of a positive outcome
en_quotes.author: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

en_quotes.quote: Resist your fear; fear will never lead to you a positive end. Go for your faith and what you believe
en_quotes.author: T. D. Jakes

en_quotes.quote: I'm very naturally happy, quirky and positive
en_quotes.author: Kiesza

en_quotes.quote: Being surrounded with such positive people always helps
en_quotes.author: Donovan Bailey

en_quotes.quote: I'm a very positive thinker, and I think that is what helps me the most in difficult moments
en_quotes.author: Roger Federer

en_quotes.quote: Winners make a habit of manufacturing their own positive expectations in advance of the event
en_quotes.author: Brian Tracy

en_quotes.quote: I am not trendy. I am not 'in fashion.' I am simply a positive human being who has a positive outlook on life
en_quotes.author: Thierry Mugler

en_quotes.quote: The more you drive positive change, the more enhanced your business model
en_quotes.author: Anand Mahindra

en_quotes.quote: Surround yourself with positive people and you'll be a positive person
en_quotes.author: Kellie Pickler

en_quotes.quote: Self-love, it is obvious, remains always positive and active in our natures
en_quotes.author: Gordon W. Allport

en_quotes.quote: Having a positive mental attitude is asking how something can be done rather than saying it can't be done
en_quotes.author: Bo Bennett

en_quotes.quote: I'm a big cockeyed optimist. I try to accentuate the positive as opposed to the negative
en_quotes.author: Betty White

en_quotes.quote: People like to be around those who give off positive energy
en_quotes.author: Erin Heatherton

en_quotes.quote: The first thing successful people do is view failure as a positive signal to success
en_quotes.author: Brendon Burchard

en_quotes.quote: I'm a really, really optimistic and really, really positive person. My main thing is, 'Enjoy life. Celebrate life.'
en_quotes.author: Luke Bryan

en_quotes.quote: When you go through a negative situation, don't think about it. Make it positive
en_quotes.author: Yoko Ono

en_quotes.quote: My father... gave me a positive connection with men because he is a gentleman
en_quotes.author: Iman

en_quotes.quote: Most of us start out with a positive attitude and a plan to do our best
en_quotes.author: Marilu Henner

en_quotes.quote: I think anytime you can affect people in general, in a positive way, then you're a lucky individual
en_quotes.author: Sam Elliott

en_quotes.quote: Men are liars. We'll lie about lying if we have to. I'm an algebra liar. I figure two good lies make a positive
en_quotes.author: Tim Allen

en_quotes.quote: True health infuses positive energy in the mind, body and spirit; it is a main focus in my life
en_quotes.author: Maximillian Degenerez

en_quotes.quote: All of us profit from being corrected - if we're corrected in a positive way
en_quotes.author: Sam Walton

en_quotes.quote: I am a positive thinker. You have to have this positive energy to get somewhere
en_quotes.author: Philip Green

en_quotes.quote: Positive culture comes from being mindful, and respecting your coworkers, and being empathetic
en_quotes.author: Biz Stone

en_quotes.quote: Do your best to spread positive messages
en_quotes.author: Stephanie McMahon

en_quotes.quote: Optimists are usually wrong. But all the great change in history, positive change, was done by optimists
en_quotes.author: Thomas Friedman

en_quotes.quote: Life is measured in love and positive contributions and moments of grace
en_quotes.author: Carly Fiorina

en_quotes.quote: Something I've noticed as I get older is that I do think about the future more. It's all positive thinking
en_quotes.author: Abbie Cornish

en_quotes.quote: I love interacting with the fans and being a positive role model for little girls
en_quotes.author: Carmella

en_quotes.quote: Design our world so that we have positive social and environmental side effects
en_quotes.author: Bjarke Ingels

en_quotes.quote: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier
en_quotes.author: Colin Powell

en_quotes.quote: I have never, ever focused on the negative of things. I always look at the positive
en_quotes.author: Sonia Sotomayor

en_quotes.quote: Positive thinking will let you use the ability which you have, and that is awesome
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: I want people to get positive energy from our music
en_quotes.author: Suga

en_quotes.quote: Hope is not just... out in the sky, or accepting the facts or reality. Hope is having optimistic, positive expectations
en_quotes.author: Craig Sager

en_quotes.quote: My biggest problem will be lack of match toughness but I am a positive, optimistic person
en_quotes.author: Greg Rusedski

en_quotes.quote: Properly used, positive reinforcement is extremely powerful
en_quotes.author: B. F. Skinner

en_quotes.quote: The greatest competitive advantage in the modern economy is a positive and engaged brain
en_quotes.author: Shawn Achor

en_quotes.quote: I used to watch a lot of motivational films and videos to remain positive
en_quotes.author: S. Sreesanth

en_quotes.quote: In order to design a future of positive change, we must first become expert at changing our minds
en_quotes.author: Jacque Fresco

en_quotes.quote: Instead of hating, I have chosen to forgive and spend all of my positive energy on changing the world
en_quotes.author: Camryn Manheim

en_quotes.quote: I'm taking all the negatives in my life, and turning them into a positive
en_quotes.author: Pitbull

en_quotes.quote: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact
en_quotes.author: William James

en_quotes.quote: There are positive things that come of social media as well as negative
en_quotes.author: Millie Bobby Brown

en_quotes.quote: When my inner mood is positive, I also feel great on the outside
en_quotes.author: Liu Wen

en_quotes.quote: I think it's important to keep things positive. Sometimes you don't win, and that sucks, and you work on improving
en_quotes.author: Alex Morgan

en_quotes.quote: I've always believed that you can think positive just as well as you can think negative
en_quotes.author: James Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: My dear friend, clear your mind of cant
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I want always to be positive
en_quotes.author: Gianni Versace

en_quotes.quote: Negative or positive attention - I think it's all great
en_quotes.author: Jeffree Star

en_quotes.quote: Don't look at someone else and want to be them. Search within yourself and find out who you are and be someone positive
en_quotes.author: Kelly Rowland

en_quotes.quote: How do you nurture a positive attitude when all the statistics say you're a dead man? You go to work
en_quotes.author: Patrick Swayze

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes a good love song can change the world and create positive energy more than any political song can
en_quotes.author: Serj Tankian

en_quotes.quote: I believe that when you work on yourself, you are attracted by different, more positive beings
en_quotes.author: Isabelle Adjani

en_quotes.quote: I like to live in a world of unicorns and rainbows where I don't pay attention to anything unless it's positive
en_quotes.author: Janet Varney

en_quotes.quote: I believe that you should gravitate to people who are doing productive and positive things with their lives
en_quotes.author: Nadia Comaneci

en_quotes.quote: The simple act of paying positive attention to people has a great deal to do with productivity
en_quotes.author: Tom Peters

en_quotes.quote: It's a wonderful thing to be optimistic. It keeps you healthy and it keeps you resilient
en_quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

en_quotes.quote: I believe in human-centered AI to benefit people in positive and benevolent ways
en_quotes.author: Fei-Fei Li

en_quotes.quote: I think that if you stay positive and remain positive, you can definitely achieve the things you set out to
en_quotes.author: Franchesca Ramsey

en_quotes.quote: I was always really proud of the fact that I had a very positive influence as a role model
en_quotes.author: David Cassidy

en_quotes.quote: For me, being tall was very positive because I thought my mom was the most beautiful person ever
en_quotes.author: Lisa Leslie

en_quotes.quote: I want to be the most influential champion, in a positive light. I want to change the world
en_quotes.author: Rose Namajunas

en_quotes.quote: BYU was a really positive place for me
en_quotes.author: Tara Westover

en_quotes.quote: I don't have a very positive attitude towards rappers
en_quotes.author: Miriam Margolyes

en_quotes.quote: Better to be called something positive and inspirational than something negative
en_quotes.author: Donnie Yen

en_quotes.quote: No matter who you meet in life, you take something from them, positive or negative
en_quotes.author: Gary Allan

en_quotes.quote: My mother taught me to be honest, to be selfless, and to touch people in a positive way
en_quotes.author: Scott Eastwood

en_quotes.quote: When you think positive, good things happen
en_quotes.author: Matt Kemp

en_quotes.quote: The gift of fantasy has meant more to me than my talent for absorbing positive knowledge
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Every day brings new choices
en_quotes.author: Martha Beck

en_quotes.quote: Waking up sober is a good day. I love being able to wake up and do positive things, to go to the gym
en_quotes.author: Rodney King

en_quotes.quote: The way positive reinforcement is carried out is more important than the amount
en_quotes.author: B. F. Skinner

en_quotes.quote: Satisfaction consists in freedom from pain, which is the positive element of life
en_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

en_quotes.quote: You need to be able to manage stress because hard times will come, and a positive outlook is what gets you through
en_quotes.author: Marie Osmond

en_quotes.quote: Perseverance is a positive, active characteristic
en_quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

en_quotes.quote: Everything has positive and negative consequences
en_quotes.author: Farrah Fawcett

en_quotes.quote: I hope that others can turn their negative thoughts into positive thoughts and improve their own lives
en_quotes.author: Farrah Abraham

en_quotes.quote: God never ends anything on a negative; God always ends on a positive
en_quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

en_quotes.quote: My grandmother, she's been the positive portion of my life the entire time
en_quotes.author: Curtis Jackson

en_quotes.quote: I believe in Karma. If the good is sown, the good is collected. When positive things are made, that returns well
en_quotes.author: Yannick Noah

en_quotes.quote: If a girl is smiling and is bringing positive energy and she's happy, that's what I notice right away - and her teeth
en_quotes.author: Chandler Parsons

en_quotes.quote: I come from a family of strong women, who have been positive role models for me
en_quotes.author: Laura Harrier

en_quotes.quote: Anytime you get an opportunity to put more fun into the game, that's good. I've got a lot of positive energy
en_quotes.author: Antonio Brown

en_quotes.quote: President Trump has a magnetic personality and exudes positive energy, which is infectious to those around him
en_quotes.author: Hope Hicks

en_quotes.quote: I've always been able to transform happiness and pain and sorrow and tears into positive energy
en_quotes.author: Thalia

en_quotes.quote: I was determined to share my positive approach and not let diabetes stand in the way of enjoying my life
en_quotes.author: Paula Deen

en_quotes.quote: I always see everything in a positive light
en_quotes.author: Karishma Tanna

en_quotes.quote: I am very positive. I like to box. I like my life. I am happy every day
en_quotes.author: Gennady Golovkin

en_quotes.quote: I work my butt off and have a positive attitude
en_quotes.author: Urijah Faber

en_quotes.quote: A President cannot always be popular
en_quotes.author: Harry S Truman

en_quotes.quote: Life is a lot more fun with good, positive people around you
en_quotes.author: Whitney Wolfe Herd

en_quotes.quote: I think if I have a lot of positive energy out there, I'll be fine
en_quotes.author: Nick Kyrgios

en_quotes.quote: If we give something positive to others, it will return to us. If we give negative, that negativity will be returned
en_quotes.author: Allu Arjun

en_quotes.quote: Today or any day that phone may ring and bring good news
en_quotes.author: Ethel Waters

en_quotes.quote: We have to try to be positive now and look to the future and think positive things: then positive things will happen
en_quotes.author: Patrick Bamford

en_quotes.quote: Suffering is the positive element in this world, indeed it is the only link between this world and the positive
en_quotes.author: Franz Kafka

en_quotes.quote: I found that being with happy positive people annoys me
en_quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

en_quotes.quote: I stay positive, keep positive energy to myself
en_quotes.author: Metro Boomin

en_quotes.quote: I think the positive competition between states in India is one of the most positive dynamics that the country has
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: You can't take it on that you're responsible for somebody else's well-being, but you can be positive and bring them up
en_quotes.author: Jonah Marais

en_quotes.quote: I choose to focus on the positive
en_quotes.author: Halima Aden

en_quotes.quote: For, to be a stranger is naturally a very positive relation; it is a specific form of interaction
en_quotes.author: Georg Simmel

en_quotes.quote: Positive vacations have a significant effect upon energy and stress
en_quotes.author: Shawn Achor

en_quotes.quote: Life is all about being positive and celebrating what you have in the moment
en_quotes.author: Vivek Oberoi

en_quotes.quote: I am fascinated by what is beautiful, strong, healthy, what is living. I seek harmony
en_quotes.author: Leni Riefenstahl

en_quotes.quote: The most positive men are the most credulous
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: Listening is a positive act: you have to put yourself out to do it
en_quotes.author: David Hockney

en_quotes.quote: There's always going to be something positive that can come out of any negative situation
en_quotes.author: Victoria Arlen

en_quotes.quote: Even with all the negativeness of the whole social media thing, I still think it's leaps and bounds more positive
en_quotes.author: Luke Bryan

en_quotes.quote: I think of feedback as constructive, not positive or negative. You choose to do what you want with it
en_quotes.author: Denise Morrison

en_quotes.quote: I'm a positive guy, even if I don't smile a lot
en_quotes.author: James Arthur

en_quotes.quote: I'm always angry. I wake up angry. There is a lot to be angry about. Anger is a positive energy
en_quotes.author: Thandie Newton

en_quotes.quote: Mentally, you can't expect positive things to start happening in your life with a negative attitude
en_quotes.author: Jinder Mahal

en_quotes.quote: What I strive for is that everywhere I go, I leave a positive impact
en_quotes.author: Clarence Seedorf

en_quotes.quote: I try to put a positive spin on things
en_quotes.author: Krysten Ritter

en_quotes.quote: I try to be very positive. I surround myself with positive people, and the negative people can leave
en_quotes.author: Paige

en_quotes.quote: The person who can bring the spirit of laughter into a room is indeed blessed
en_quotes.author: Bennett Cerf

en_quotes.quote: I like when a man has a positive self-image, no matter what he looks like. I'm not into rock-hard abs
en_quotes.author: Jessica Parker Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: I lived in the projects and the ghetto, and turned the negative into a positive
en_quotes.author: Wyclef Jean

en_quotes.quote: There is no advertisement as powerful as a positive reputation traveling fast
en_quotes.author: Brian Koslow

en_quotes.quote: Even if things are not going well for you... just stay in the positive way of thinking
en_quotes.author: Anitta

en_quotes.quote: I learned one thing - never hate a positive option
en_quotes.author: Kevin Garnett

en_quotes.quote: It's all positive energy from me, man
en_quotes.author: Swizz Beatz

en_quotes.quote: Stubbornness is a positive quality of presidential leadership - if you're right about what you're stubborn about
en_quotes.author: Douglas Brinkley

en_quotes.quote: The most important thing is to stay positive
en_quotes.author: Saku Koivu

en_quotes.quote: Say and do something positive that will help the situation; it doesn't take any brains to complain
en_quotes.author: Robert A. Cook

en_quotes.quote: I had to really create a positive atmosphere for myself, and that has to come from within
en_quotes.author: Rose Namajunas

en_quotes.quote: To delight in war is a merit in the soldier, a dangerous quality in the captain, and a positive crime in the statesman
en_quotes.author: George Santayana

en_quotes.quote: When someone does something good, applaud! You will make two people happy
en_quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

en_quotes.quote: Character is the ability of a person to see a positive end of things. This is the hope that a man of character has
en_quotes.author: Tom Landry

en_quotes.quote: Excellence encourages one about life generally; it shows the spiritual wealth of the world
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: Look at people for an example, but then make sure to do things your way. Surround yourself with positive people
en_quotes.author: Queen Latifah

en_quotes.quote: Staying consistent with positive habits can be a challenge
en_quotes.author: Lewis Howes

en_quotes.quote: I try to stay positive and be very, very active
en_quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

en_quotes.quote: My whole thing is just to put out positive messages in the music, give people something that can change their lives
en_quotes.author: Kid Cudi

en_quotes.quote: I have always wanted to be a catalyst for bringing about positive change, inspiring others to choose goodness
en_quotes.author: Shari Arison

en_quotes.quote: I just want to put some positive stuff out there. If it works, great. If it doesn't, no problem
en_quotes.author: Kevin James

en_quotes.quote: If we just wanted positive emotions, our species would have died out a long time ago
en_quotes.author: Martin Seligman

en_quotes.quote: I take my forgetfulness in a positive stride because I also forget the problems
en_quotes.author: Hina Khan

en_quotes.quote: To see the positive reaction to my music makes me feel good
en_quotes.author: Cardi B

en_quotes.quote: I am a positive person, and I want to look ahead in life and do something for my parents and the country
en_quotes.author: Hima Das

en_quotes.quote: You have to train your brain to be positive just like you work out your body
en_quotes.author: Shawn Achor

en_quotes.quote: Dallas is a positive, get-it done city
en_quotes.author: Laura Miller

en_quotes.quote: Faith Words aren't just mere positive affirmations; they open your life up to the supernatural power of God
en_quotes.author: Bo Sanchez

en_quotes.quote: If you don't have negative experiences, you have no way to gauge the positive ones, and you have no way to deal with it
en_quotes.author: John Gourley

en_quotes.quote: I do believe in sending positive messages. I am a Christian, so I do believe in a lot of positive messages
en_quotes.author: Quinton Aaron

en_quotes.quote: I am a very positive person
en_quotes.author: Kubra Sait

en_quotes.quote: My optimism wears heavy boots and is loud
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: Good leaders need a positive agenda, not just an agenda of dealing with crisis
en_quotes.author: Michael Porter

en_quotes.quote: A lot of people love to do affirmations first thing in the morning - to keep themselves feeling peppy and positive
en_quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

en_quotes.quote: For a manager to be perceived as a positive manager, they need a four to one positive to negative contact ratio
en_quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

en_quotes.quote: Rising incomes and positive demographics will provide opportunities for retail financial services in India
en_quotes.author: Chanda Kochhar

en_quotes.quote: First of all, I try to be a positive role model
en_quotes.author: Caitlyn Jenner

en_quotes.quote: I am a very positive person in real life
en_quotes.author: Dhanush

en_quotes.quote: I don't think the world focuses on the positive things enough
en_quotes.author: Dwyane Wade

en_quotes.quote: I think my philosophy in music has been to accentuate the positive
en_quotes.author: Mike Love

en_quotes.quote: I influence people, hopefully on the positive side
en_quotes.author: Isaac Hayes

en_quotes.quote: I'm very positive - music-wise, production-wise and life-wise
en_quotes.author: Martin Garrix

en_quotes.quote: Revenge is not a positive state of mind or energy to indulge your self in
en_quotes.author: Michael K. Williams

en_quotes.quote: I am not embarrassed to tell you that I believe in miracles
en_quotes.author: Corazon Aquino

en_quotes.quote: If I knew I was positive, why would I have ever gone to PAW to take a test?
en_quotes.author: Marc Wallice

en_quotes.quote: You need to train your brain to be positive
en_quotes.author: Nargis Fakhri

en_quotes.quote: My belief is that a positive culture works best because people want to meet or exceed expectations, not demands
en_quotes.author: Ron Williams

en_quotes.quote: Only fools are positive
en_quotes.author: Moe Howard

en_quotes.quote: You have to be positive, and I'm not just talking about athletics, this also applies to life
en_quotes.author: Sheryl Swoopes

en_quotes.quote: Every person gets negative things, they learn from those negative things, and you become a positive person
en_quotes.author: Kapil Dev

en_quotes.quote: We all go through things in life, and it's just how you deal with it. Try to stay positive throughout the worst
en_quotes.author: Phil Heath

en_quotes.quote: There is something in even the darkest situations that we can make a positive in our lives
en_quotes.author: Deborah Norville

en_quotes.quote: As an artist, the more experience, the better the creation. I'm a very positive person
en_quotes.author: Psy

en_quotes.quote: I think the state of the NFL has a very positive outlook
en_quotes.author: Roger Goodell

en_quotes.quote: I live to leave somebody with a positive experience when they've met me, and make someone smile for the day
en_quotes.author: Dolph Ziggler

en_quotes.quote: There's a fine line between stubbornness and the positive side of that, which is dogged determination
en_quotes.author: Jeb Bush

en_quotes.quote: My ultimate aim is to make euthanasia a positive experience
en_quotes.author: Jack Kevorkian

en_quotes.quote: Why use your natural abilities to make someone feel bad? I just want to be the guy who uses his power to be positive
en_quotes.author: Kenny Omega

en_quotes.quote: Be positive and laugh at everything
en_quotes.author: Alexandra Roach

en_quotes.quote: I'm a positive person, and I try to look at the good side of everything
en_quotes.author: Leona Lewis

en_quotes.quote: I want my life to effect the balance to the positive
en_quotes.author: Mira Sorvino

en_quotes.quote: Any move to reduce government spending is a positive for the economy
en_quotes.author: Stephen Moore

en_quotes.quote: I think that when you rally powerful voices around powerful issues, what you get are positive results
en_quotes.author: Kerby Jean-Raymond

en_quotes.quote: For whatever reason, I'm pretty good with pressure. I kinda just flip it over and think of it as positive
en_quotes.author: Chloe Kim

en_quotes.quote: I have always been a very positive person and tried to bring the positives from the hardest moments
en_quotes.author: Juan Mata

en_quotes.quote: You have to be positive and turn things in your favour
en_quotes.author: Rafael Benitez

en_quotes.quote: Love is a positive, symbiotic, reciprocal flow between two or more entities
en_quotes.author: Inga Muscio

en_quotes.quote: The actual danger is nothing, and the positive advantages very great
en_quotes.author: William John Wills

en_quotes.quote: As a goalie, you must stay positive. And if you do make a mistake, well, those things happen when you play my position
en_quotes.author: Henrik Lundqvist

en_quotes.quote: Health and a positive body image are part of my personal values
en_quotes.author: Deborah Joy Winans

en_quotes.quote: You want to focus on the fans and on the positive energy that you receive from them
en_quotes.author: Lance Stroll

en_quotes.quote: I'm a very positive person in my life. I'm very optimistic
en_quotes.author: Cody Fern

en_quotes.quote: There's going to be positive and negative in anything in life
en_quotes.author: Samuel Larsen

en_quotes.quote: My purpose: to lift your spirit and to motivate you
en_quotes.author: Mavis Staples

en_quotes.quote: The key thing about wealth in a capitalist economy is that it reproduces itself and usually earns a positive net return
en_quotes.author: Robert Solow

en_quotes.quote: I got a lot of positive people around me
en_quotes.author: Dave Chappelle

en_quotes.quote: To be positive is to be mistaken at the top of one's voice
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: Positive, adj.: Mistaken at the top of one's voice
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: Whatever role I play is a positive role; it's a strong role. Never negative
en_quotes.author: Mr. T

en_quotes.quote: There is a sense that things, if you keep positive and optimistic about what can be done, do work out
en_quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

en_quotes.quote: Publishers like a good buzz, and negative responses sell books just as well as positive ones
en_quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

en_quotes.quote: Nature isn't positive in that way. It doesn't aim itself at you. It's not being unkind to you
en_quotes.author: David Attenborough

en_quotes.quote: I've gotten nothing but warmth from the Black community and positive feedback
en_quotes.author: Misty Copeland

en_quotes.quote: I'm pretty positive, optimistic, so I always expect the best
en_quotes.author: Jurgen Klopp

en_quotes.quote: You hear certain things, negative things, all the time that aren't true, but you never hear about the positive
en_quotes.author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: I do not expect the white media to create positive black male images
en_quotes.author: Huey Newton

en_quotes.quote: Talking is always positive. That's why I talk too much
en_quotes.author: Louis C. K.

en_quotes.quote: What I have is P.H. positive chronic myeloid leukemia, which is an aberration in your white blood cells
en_quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

en_quotes.quote: I feel equal to Mexicans, Asians, everyone. That's the kind of positive message I want to get out
en_quotes.author: Lewis Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: Where men of judgment creep and feel their way, The positive pronounce without dismay
en_quotes.author: William Cowper

en_quotes.quote: My emotions, when I think about the time I spent at Spurs, are always really positive
en_quotes.author: Luka Modric

en_quotes.quote: We need a bold, new, positive vision for the future of our country
en_quotes.author: Theresa May

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes the most positive thing you can be in a boring society is absolutely negative
en_quotes.author: John Lydon

en_quotes.quote: I surround myself with positive, productive people of good will and decency
en_quotes.author: Ted Nugent

en_quotes.quote: I just believe in the goodwill of people, the power of people to do something positive
en_quotes.author: Eddie Izzard

en_quotes.quote: I don't want to waste anyone's time or money. I want to give people some truth and positive heart lift
en_quotes.author: Mos Def

en_quotes.quote: Whatever I do, I want to impact people's lives in a positive way
en_quotes.author: Hilary Knight

en_quotes.quote: My personality can be extreme in all ways, even in positive ways; I've learned that
en_quotes.author: Albert Hammond, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: I'm almost positive I have some type of PTSD. Almost a decade of my life was consumed by the prison system
en_quotes.author: Remy Ma

en_quotes.quote: I had to learn how to think as a positive human being, before anything
en_quotes.author: Hit-Boy

en_quotes.quote: Fortune cookies are a good idea. If the message is positive, it can make your day a little better
en_quotes.author: Yao Ming

en_quotes.quote: I hope to make a positive, productive contribution, as cheesy as that may sound
en_quotes.author: Chelsea Clinton

en_quotes.quote: Surround yourself with positive people
en_quotes.author: Melanie Fiona

en_quotes.quote: I have found that nurturing our creative side feeds all aspects of one's life and those around us in a positive way
en_quotes.author: Shervin Pishevar

en_quotes.quote: I'm not the most positive person
en_quotes.author: Penny Marshall

en_quotes.quote: Design can have such a positive impact on the way people live and on their relationships and moods
en_quotes.author: Genevieve Gorder

en_quotes.quote: Removing all stimulation around you is a really positive thing in terms of stimulating your creativity
en_quotes.author: Grimes

en_quotes.quote: I'm so glad that all the work that my family and I are doing is yielding positive results and making actual change!
en_quotes.author: Nicole Maines

en_quotes.quote: Rwanda was the best place. The people are so nice and positive about their future
en_quotes.author: Taylor Steele

en_quotes.quote: It's amazing what one positive role model in your life can do in five minutes
en_quotes.author: Catherine Oxenberg

en_quotes.quote: A buoyant, positive approach to the game is as basic as a sound swing
en_quotes.author: Tony Lema

en_quotes.quote: If it's great stuff, the people who consume it are nourished. It's a positive force
en_quotes.author: Manuel Puig

en_quotes.quote: I'm motivated by the positive ways in which Bitcoin use being widespread will make the world a better place
en_quotes.author: Roger Ver

en_quotes.quote: I always loved designing, but the context needs to be right, and have a positive perspective
en_quotes.author: Hedi Slimane

en_quotes.quote: I have never won a race, and that is my main disappointment - but you have to be positive
en_quotes.author: Jean Alesi

en_quotes.quote: I am enough. Always.
I am love.
I am loving.
I am loved.
I trust in the person I am.
I am kind to myself.
I make time to look after myself.
I deserve love respect.
I am strong and capable.
I have a lot to offer the world.
I am sunshine.
I have a beautiful laugh.
My smile makes others smile.
I exude warmth and kindness.
My heart is full of love for who I am.
Love is what I believe in most of all.
My hugs are full of love and warmth.
I bring joy to the world.
I rock at being me!
I am proud of the person I am today, and the person I will be tomorrow.
I work hard know my worth.
I have many skills to offer.
I place value on the experience I have, and my ability to learn and grow more.
I have y own definition of success.
I take pride in the work I do.
Work is an important part of my life but it is not my sole purpose or passion.
When I work, I apply myself with focus and positivity.
I take time to rest after working hard.
I am reliable responsible and respected at work.
I am creative person.
There is always a place in the world for my creativity.
I share what I create with pride and grace.
The world wants more of what I have to offer.
There is always a place in the world for what I create and make.
I am passionate about my creativity.
My creativity has a purpose in my life and in the world.
My is fuller when I make time and space for my creativity.
I keep my eyes, ears and heart open for creativity inspiration.
Living a creative life is important to me; it makes me a healthier, happier person.
I am worth of love and trust in my relationships and friendships.
Ifocus on what Ican control and I l et go of w hat I can't.
l ove my beautiful mind.
I invest in myself through big and small acts of self-care and self- love.
My inner strength knows no bounds.
I breathe in energy and love, I exhale negativity and doubt.
I take time to know my needs, limits and boundaries better.
Good mental health is a j ourney, not a destination.
My mental health is just as important as my physical health.
I'm not ashamed or alone in having mental health strugges.
Iook after my mentalhealth because it deserves my love.
I am worthy of love and trust in my relationships and friendships.
I actively nurture healthy relationships with the people I love.
I bring joy to those around me.
I am grateful for all who love and care for me.
My friendships are important to me.
I am a loyal, loving friend.
I know how important it is to just listen to others.
My friends love and respect me.
My relationships bring me joy.
I surround myself with people I love and care about. but also take time to nurture my relationship with myself.
I am always stronger than I look and feel.
I walk tall and am proud of who I am.
My body is my best friend.
When I eat well.exercise and get enough sleep. I am investing in myself.
I am proud of all my body does for me.Every single day.
I listen to what my body needs.
Ido not compare my body to other peoples' bodies.
I love what my body is capable of doing now and in the future.
I am thankful that my body is both beautiful and strong.
I use my body with love. pride and care.
I am al owed to have bad days.
I am brave to endure days like today.
I am patient with and kind to myself.
Tomorrow is more than another day; it's another chance to shine.
I look forward to feeling better about things again.
Life is tough sometimes, but so am I .
I am a survivor and that makes me proud of myself.
On hard days like this, I love myself more than ever.
My bad days and unhappy moments will al ways pass.
I can see the end of this hard time.and I move towards it with every breath I take.
I deserve to feel good about myself right now.
This positive energy is of my own creating.
I am excited.
I savour feeling good about myself.
It is important that I take a moment to cherish feeling at peace with myself.
These good days feed my soul and help me prepare for harder times.
I celebrate myself and what I have achieved today, and every day.
The future is bright, and so is the light shining in side me.
I aim to share with others the positivity and love I feel for life.
I do not have to change for anybody.
There is nobody else in the world li ke me. That is my magic.
I am not afraid to be different.
I am true to my wonderful self.
I am loved for who I am right now.
In the future.all will be well with my beautiful soul.
I trust that I am strong enough to face whatever the future brings.
I deserve good things in my future.
I look forward to living tomorrow.and tomorrow 's tomorrow.
Sometimes Idon't know where I'm going. But I will find my way.And it will be fabulous. (edited)
